item.title: Dumps of fly-tipping at Courtauld House, 3rd September
item.description:
Fly tipping of wooden pallets which is a potential fire hazard and needs removing ASAP. Also multiple dumps of household items such as beds, rubbish sacks etc. around the estate, Please remove.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pritchards Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hackney Council need to cut, maintain dead bushes and remove these dead trees. There is no purpose to keep a dead Bush or dead tree in place.There is a infestation of large f****** rats running around due to resonant planting bushes and trees with no permission from Council.Lack of maintenance now there is a rat infestation vermin nesting in bushes. The resident is also storing a large blue barrel waste bin for household waste which is attracting the vermin/rats. This blue barrel waist compost bin needs to be removed environment health issues being caused. Resident is storing household waste food in the bin attracting rats to the neighborhood. Residence leaving raw food around for wildlife.Nigerian care worker in the area was screaming when she see one large rat running past her.she ran for her life and was praying,screaming at same time.These trees and bushes are becoming a environment health issue for residents if they were not there there will be no issue of reps and vermin nesting. Public land meant for public people to use., 3rd September
item.description:
Food compost bin on public land being stored attracting rats and vermin. Rat infestation.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Daintry Way, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly-tipping from people outside of the construction team, 3rd September
item.description:
There are opportunistic flytippers that are placing general rubbish here on this corner (photo 1) The construction team are clearing their waste and rubble however, people are opportunistically adding to it. A picture of the corner after the construction team cleared it. (Photo 2) Please can we stop the fly tippers. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 336, East Street, Old Kent Road, London

item.title: The pothole on the carriageway flyover at black prince requires attention, 3rd September
item.description:
The pothole on the carriageway flyover requires urgent attention and repaired as is at least 4inch deep and 6 inches wide, this pothole was temporarily repaired about a month ago and it has now become dangerous for road users that have to swerve round it. The traffic management need arrange a long term solution and just not a quickie win
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bourne Road, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet
